name: Grimoire Fantastica
description:
Grimoire Fantastica

Through a stone labyrinth, in an underground crypt, Hector pursues a book of legendary power. Maddened monsters strive to strike down the lone wizard. Can the Grimoire grant Hector's wish?

Features
  • Four Characters
  • 3D rendered backgrounds
  • Custom music and sound effects
  • Based on a short story
